body_html:
@gypleon : Feel free to file a new issue if you're having trouble loading the saved model - though do include a short example to reproduce the problem.

Haven't heard back from @fancyerii , but there was certainly a problem wherein the model was being exported with random weights, not the trained weights. Not sure about @joyspark 's issue

body:
@gypleon : Feel free to file a new issue if you're having trouble loading the saved model - though do include a short example to reproduce the problem.

Haven't heard back from @fancyerii , but there was certainly a problem wherein the model was being exported with random weights, not the trained weights. Not sure about @joyspark 's issue
